thread.title: 21 Pilots Took Off Their Pants to Accept Their Grammy Award
thread.title_full: 21 Pilots Took Off Their Pants to Accept Their Grammy Award

author: Dana Eisenberg
title: 21 Pilots Took Off Their Pants to Accept Their Grammy Award
text:
21 Pilots Took Off Their Pants to Accept Their Grammy Award by Dana Eisenberg | 8:40 pm, February 12th, 2017 
Tonight, 21 Pilots won the Grammy Award for Best Pop Duo/Group Performance. When Tyler Joseph and Josh Dun got up to accept the award, they took their pants off before walking onstage. 
During their acceptance speech, they told the story of how they once watched the awards show together and at some point they noticed they were all in their underwear. Joseph said that Josh turned to him and said “If we ever go to the Grammys, if we win a Grammy, we should receive it just like this.” 
Watch the video above. 
Have a tip we should know? Follow Mediaite
